GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, default sorted by descending created_at

GET /api/articles/:aticle_id.description: serves an object with the requested article
